content:
As a result of the shelling of the village of the Netaylovy Ochachyn community of Donetsk region, a woman was killed.

About thisreportedHead of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin.

The village came under half a nine in the morning-a 63-year-old woman got a deadly wound and died on the way to the hospital.

“Every day Russian terrorists commit new and new military crimes on our land. They will be responsible for everything, ”Vadim Filashkin said.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result ofRussian attackOn March 6, Pokrovsk was hit by the city of Pokrovsk on March 6, all four missiles of the C-300 complex were hit by the city center. 12 multi -storey buildings and several cars were damaged.
title: Russian troops fired the village in Donetsk region, a woman was killed
description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin. The village came under fire at half ...
author: Army Inform
